title: Temuan Village Trail
listingSummary: Travellers will embark on a 3-4 hour long nature journey through the protected forests of the Orang Asli Temuan community alongside the locals themselves who will act as guides and teachers along the path - teaching travellers indigenous knowledge and stories. At the end of every experience, our local guide and his family will then prepare a post-hike meal (local Asli cuisine) for travellers to enjoy at his home.
summaryTitle: A 3-4 hour journey through the village of Kampung Sungai Lalang Bahru
experienceSummary: Our Native hosts from the Temuan Tribe will act as both guides and teachers, sharing indigenous knowledge and stories along the path with insights on flora and fauna, cultural beliefs, and even their modern day struggles. Guests will then be given access to a host’s home where you enjoy a post-hike homecooked lunch of Temuan dishes with his family.

itinerary.title: 7:30AM
itinerary.description: Arrival at Kampung Sungai Lalang Bahru (The Orang Asli Village).

itinerary.title: 12:00PM
itinerary.description: Lunch at Villager's Home (local Asli cuisine prepared by guide’s family).

testimonials.name: Jason
testimonials.quoteText: That was a wonderful experience- being able to learn about village life from our Orang Asli guides, and our knowledgeable and kind organizers/translators,was an absolutely unique experience.

testimonials.name: Pei She
testimonials.quoteText: Overall a great little excursion into the outdoors, led by locals Faizul and Busi who were well acquainted with the forest and the land. Highlight of the day was getting to visit the home of Faizul and having a home cooked meal by his wife, where we chatted and listened to stories of the village and the houses that have been built as part of EPIC Homes.

testimonials.name: Ying
testimonials.quoteText: 这是一段非常美好的经历,已经厌倦了城市游,浮于表面的游客观光之旅,这个Airbnb经历完全是我想体验的内容:没被过度开发过的原生态自然.

faq.question: WHAT IS PROVIDED?
answers: A local indigenous meal prepared by the villagers
Water (bring your own water bottle to refill)

faq.question: WHAT TO BRING?
answers: Sturdy Trail Shoes (Note: high likelihood we may need to walk in shallow rivers)
